name: Couch Potato Shooter
description:
Description

Couch Potato Shooter is a simple  shooter where you control the DVD logo destroying couches using potatoes! Destroy 50 couches in total to win! This is a game made with Unity and assets from the Unity Asset Store.

Controls

W - Move Forward

A - Strafe Left

S - Move Back

D - Strafe Right

Left Click - Launch a Potato!
